itunes:title: Episode 487 - Sadr City Nightmare
title: Episode 487 - Sadr City Nightmare
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with Jarred's former Staff Sgt. Jeff Taylor as he chats about what it was like to serve with JT and Dan overseas, how incredibly fun and equally shi**y it was to fight in Sadr City, how he'd give anything to go ba...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with Jarred's former Staff Sgt. Jeff Taylor as he chats about what it was like to serve with JT and Dan overseas, how incredibly fun and equally shi**y it was to fight in Sadr City, how he'd give anything to go back into a gunfight again, and what it's like to retire after 25 years in the military.
